comment_text: This isn't directed at this particular post, but more to HN in general. Why do I now constantly see "Tool XYZ (written in Go)" as though this is a hugely important aspect? I've never seen a "Tool ABC (written in Java)", so what's so great about Go? I know the features of the language help ensure "safe" development, but if someone was releasing software, I'd expect it to be relatively safe no matter what the language. So why is a tool being written in Go so important?
author: Velox
story_title: Rtop – agentless sever monitoring tool (built with Go)
